verses.verse: David's <S%H1732><s%> Psalm of praise <S%H8416><s%>. I will extol <S%H7311><s%> thee, my God <S%H430><s%>, O king <S%H4428><s%>; and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
Every day <S%H3117><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> thee; and I will praise <S%H1984><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.

Great <S%H1419><s%> is the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%>; and his greatness <S%H1420><s%> is unsearchable <S%H2714><s%>. and his: Heb. and of his greatness there is no search
One <S%H1755><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> shall praise <S%H7623><s%> thy works <S%H4639><s%> to another, and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> thy mighty acts <S%H1369><s%>.
I will speak <S%H7878><s%> of the glorious <S%H3519><s%> honour <S%H1926><s%> of thy majesty <S%H1935><s%>, and of thy wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works <S%H1697><s%>. works: Heb. things, or, words
And men shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the might <S%H5807><s%> of thy terrible acts <S%H3372><s%>: and I will declare <S%H5608><s%> thy greatness <S%H1420><s%>. declare: Heb. declare it
They shall abundantly utter <S%H5042><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of thy great <S%H7227><s%> goodness <S%H2898><s%>, and shall sing <S%H7442><s%> of thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is gracious <S%H2587><s%>, and full of compassion <S%H7349><s%>; slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and of great <S%H1419><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%>. of great: Heb. great in mercy
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to all: and his tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> are over all his works <S%H4639><s%>.
All thy works <S%H4639><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> thee, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and thy saints <S%H2623><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> thee.
They shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of thy kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, and talk <S%H1696><s%> of thy power <S%H1369><s%>;
To make known <S%H3045><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> his mighty acts <S%H1369><s%>, and the glorious <S%H3519><s%> majesty <S%H1926><s%> of his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>.

Thy kingdom <S%H4438><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, and thy dominion <S%H4475><s%> endureth throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>. an: Heb. a kingdom of all ages
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> upholdeth <S%H5564><s%> all that fall <S%H5307><s%>, and raiseth up <S%H2210><s%> all those that be bowed down <S%H3721><s%>.
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all wait <S%H7663><s%> upon thee; and thou givest <S%H5414><s%> them their meat <S%H400><s%> in due season <S%H6256><s%>. wait: or, look unto
Thou openest <S%H6605><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and satisfiest <S%H7646><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of every living thing <S%H2416><s%>.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and holy <S%H2623><s%> in all his works <S%H4639><s%>. holy: or, merciful, or, bountiful
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto all them that call <S%H7121><s%> upon him, to all that call <S%H7121><s%> upon him in truth <S%H571><s%>.
He will fulfil <S%H6213><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him: he also will hear <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H7775><s%>, and will save <S%H3467><s%> them.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> preserveth <S%H8104><s%> all them that love <S%H157><s%> him: but all the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will he destroy <S%H8045><s%>.

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> the praise <S%H8416><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and let all flesh <S%H1320><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
